channel.title: The truth about radio
channel.description:
A series that features interviews with important figures in the radio industry.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Edwin G. Burrows
item.description: Richard Doan interviews Edwin G. Burrows, chairman of National Association of Educational Broadcasters and manager of WUOM at the University of Michigan. He discusses his station and educational radio and television programming.
item.dc:creator: Doan, Richard
item.dc:subject: Educational radio programs.

item.title: Nicholas Johnson
item.description: Richard Doan interviews Federal Communications Commission member Nicholas Johnson.
item.dc:creator: Doan, Richard
item.dc:subject: United States. Federal Communications Commission.
